name: rosette drawstring bag
sizes_available: size 1: 6”/15 cm across, 7”/18 cm tall, 14.5”/37 cm circumference, straps are 16”/41 cm long (measured from top of bag); size 2: 8”/20 cm across, 9”/23 cm tall, 19”/48 cm circumference, straps are 18”/46 cm long (measured from top of bag)
notes:
crochet this modern day regency-inspired drawstring bag using the lovely shell stitch! this elegant and romantic bag is quick to work up and can be worn cross body.  make one for yourself and your little ones so you can match!

the free **rosette drawstring bag** crochet pattern can be found ***[here][1]***! note that the pdf for purchase is 11 pages and includes the full photo tutorial.

the pattern contains two sizes: size 1 and size 2.  size 1 requires 1 skein of 24/7 cotton (i used "camel") and size 2 requires 1.5 skeins of 24/7 cotton (i used "ecru").  

the rosette drawstring bag is the modern version of my popular **[regency reticule][2]** that i designed for a pride and prejudice ball.  see the free reticule pattern ***[here][3]***!

it is such a cute spring and summer bag, and the closure allows for easy access to your essential items.  enjoy crocheting your bags and use the hashtag **#rosettedrawstringbag** on social media! 


  [1]: https://www.allaboutami.com/rosette-drawstring-bag/
  [2]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/regency-reticule?
  [3]: https://www.allaboutami.com/crochet-regency-reticule/
